snippet: Nothing seems amiss from outside the high chain-link fence on Conant Street as mechanics labor under the Southern California sun to prepare the hulking MD-11 and MD-80 passenger jets at the Douglas Aircraft plant here for airlines in China and Ind...
lead_paragraph: Nothing seems amiss from outside the high chain-link fence on Conant Street as mechanics labor under the Southern California sun to prepare the hulking MD-11 and MD-80 passenger jets at the Douglas Aircraft plant here for airlines in China and Indonesia. The gleaming jets have long been proud symbols of California's economic and technological prowess. But at the plant gate around the corner, Kent Fulfer displayed another, newer and less appealing symbol of California: his layoff notice.

headline.main: California, Land of Crises, Mingles Despair and Hope
